markdownRemark.html:
Nm=#{xi∈Rm}[Number of points in node]j=attributes=value\begin{aligned} N_m &= \#\{x_i \in R_m\} & [\text{Number of points in node}]\\ j &= \text{attribute} &\\ s &= \text{value} &\\ \end{aligned}Nm​js​=#{xi​∈Rm​}=attribute=value​[Number of points in node]​

Regression

c^m=1Nm∑xi∈Rmyi[Output]j,s=min⁡j,s[min⁡c1∑xi∈R1(j,s)(yi−c1)2+min⁡c2∑xi∈R2(j,s)(yi−c2)2][Splitting Condition]\begin{aligned} \hat{c}_m &= \frac{1}{N_m} \sum_{x_i \in R_m} y_i & [\text{Output}]\\ j, s &= \min_{j, s} \left[\min_{c_1} \sum_{x_i \in R_1 (j, s)} (y_i - c_1)^2 + \min_{c_2} \sum_{x_i \in R_2 (j, s)} (y_i - c_2)^2\right] & [\text{Splitting Condition}]\\ \end{aligned}c^m​j,s​=Nm​1​xi​∈Rm​∑​yi​=j,smin​⎣⎢⎡​c1​min​xi​∈R1​(j,s)∑​(yi​−c1​)2+c2​min​xi​∈R2​(j,s)∑​(yi​−c2​)2⎦⎥⎤​​[Output][Splitting Condition]​

Classification

p^mk=1Nm∑xi∈RmI(yi=k)[Probability of class k in node m]c^m=max⁡kp^mk[Output]j,s=min⁡j,s[R1(j,s)∑k=1Kp^1k(1−p^1k)+R2(j,s)∑k=1Kp^2k(1−p^2k)][Gini Index Splitting condition]j,s=min⁡j,s[−R1(j,s)∑k=1Kp^1klog⁡p^1k−R2(j,s)∑k=1Kp^2klog⁡p^2k][Cross Entropy Splitting condition]\begin{aligned} \hat{p}_{mk} &= \frac{1}{N_m} \sum_{x_i \in R_m} I(y_i = k) & [\text{Probability of class $k$ in node $m$}]\\ \hat{c}_m &= \max_{k} \hat{p}_{mk} & [\text{Output}]\\ j, s &= \min_{j, s} \left[ R_1 (j, s)\sum^{K}_{k=1} \hat{p}_{1k} (1 - \hat{p}_{1k}) + R_2 (j, s)\sum^{K}_{k=1} \hat{p}_{2k} (1 - \hat{p}_{2k}) \right] & [\text{Gini Index Splitting condition}]\\ j, s &= \min_{j, s} \left[ -R_1 (j, s)\sum^{K}_{k=1} \hat{p}_{1k} \log \hat{p}_{1k} - R_2 (j, s)\sum^{K}_{k=1} \hat{p}_{2k} \log \hat{p}_{2k} \right] & [\text{Cross Entropy Splitting condition}]\\ \end{aligned}p^​mk​c^m​j,sj,s​=Nm​1​xi​∈Rm​∑​I(yi​=k)=kmax​p^​mk​=j,smin​[R1​(j,s)k=1∑K​p^​1k​(1−p^​1k​)+R2​(j,s)k=1∑K​p^​2k​(1−p^​2k​)]=j,smin​[−R1​(j,s)k=1∑K​p^​1k​logp^​1k​−R2​(j,s)k=1∑K​p^​2k​logp^​2k​]​[Probability of class k in node m][Output][Gini Index Splitting condition][Cross Entropy Splitting condition]​
